text: TIL our Kafka retention is only 7 days for most topics. Almost lost some event data because I assumed it was 30 days 😅
Yeah, only the audit topics have 30-day retention. Everything else is 7 days. It's in the architecture doc but I agree it's easy to miss.
We should probably increase it. 7 days is tight if we need to replay events for debugging. Let me check the storage cost impact.
Checked: increasing to 14 days for all topics would cost ~$200/month more in EBS storage. I'll propose it at the next infra review.
Heads up: we're switching from Datadog to Grafana Cloud for metrics starting Q1 2025. Cost savings of ~$40K/year. Migration plan coming next week.
Will our existing dashboards migrate automatically or do we need to rebuild them?
There's a migration tool but it covers about 70% of dashboard panels. The rest will need manual recreation. Platform team will handle the shared dashboards, individual teams handle their own.
